keyMoments.title: Crew Counterattack Against Baroque Works
keyMoments.description: After Usopp frees Luffy from hypnosis, the entire crew launches a coordinated counterattack against the Baroque Works agents threatening them.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew working together to overcome a dire situation where they were nearly defeated.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Deceives Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Sanji's quick thinking in impersonating Mr. 3 prevents Crocodile from discovering the crew's survival, buying them crucial time.
keyMoments.significance: One of the crew's most important strategic victories, achieved through deception rather than combat.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.joinCircumstances: Officer Agent pair with Miss Goldenweek
Officer Agent pair with Miss Valentine

keyMoments.title: Leader Crocodile Makes First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The organization's mysterious leader, Mr. 0 (Crocodile), makes his first appearance via Den Den Mushi call to check on the mission.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true power behind Baroque Works - a Warlord of the Sea.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Officer Agents Defeated
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3, Miss Goldenweek, Mr. 5, and Miss Valentine are all defeated by the Straw Hats, representing a major failure for the organization.
keyMoments.significance: The loss of four officer agents on Little Garden is a significant blow to Baroque Works' operations.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Deceived About Mission Success
keyMoments.description: Sanji successfully tricks Crocodile into believing the Straw Hats and Vivi have been eliminated, when in reality the mission failed completely.
keyMoments.significance: This deception prevents immediate reinforcements and gives the protagonists time to continue their journey.
